title: Trump has previewed $2k checks. Here's what Americans think.
shortDescription: USA TODAY Network journalists spoke with holiday shoppers about the prospect of a tariff rebate in 2026.

title: Bill Clinton among VIPs in new Epstein file photographs
shortDescription: The ex-president is among the famous faces shown hanging out with the enigmatic financier, who died by suicide in 2019 amid sex trafficking charges

title: Newly released Epstein files include Bill Clinton
shortDescription: Former President Bill Clinton appears in photographs amid the cache of thousands of newly unsealed images in the Epstein files release.

title: Elise Stefanik exits NY governor's race, will leave Congress
shortDescription: The 41-year-old was the youngest woman elected to the House and transformed from a moderate to MAGA brawler in her defense of Trump and his agenda.

title: See Charlie Kirk's mic, Trump merch, ICE trucks at AmericaFest 2025
shortDescription: Turning Point's AmericaFest attracts thousands each year to the annual Phoenix event. Photos highlight interesting moments and scenes from the event.

title: 'I was muted.' Rep. Beatty disputes unanimous Kennedy Center vote.
shortDescription: Rep. Joyce Beatty, D-Ohio, says she was repeatedly muted before a board vote to rename the Kennedy Center, which the White House called unanimous.

title: The internet can't stop talking about Vanity Fair's Trump cabinet portraits
shortDescription: A collection of portraits depicting Trump's inner circle published in Vanity Fair have exploded online. Here's why.

title: Trump's name added to facade of Kennedy Center building
shortDescription: The Trump administration moved quickly to add the president's name to signage for the newly branded Trump-Kennedy Center.
